name: doco
description: The JavaScript documentation generator used in dojo, the node.js application server.
author: Daniel Wirtz <dcode@dcode.io>

scripts.test: node bin/doco < tests/bcrypt.js > tests/bcrypt.json && node bin/doco --gen=markdown < tests/bcrypt.js > tests/bcrypt.md && node bin/doco --gen=html < tests/bcrypt.js > tests/bcrypt.html
